channel.title: Custom items are nulls
channel.description:
i put in the codes and add them to the server item list. put stats on them and then i compile and restart everything. and i use the item id to spawn it and it is a null. how do i fix this. there is problem with my client compile but that has always been an error and there werent any other after i added the custom item code. please help.
i don't know if it is a server problem or a client so i went with my gut.

item.title: Custom items are nulls
item.dc:creator: @Ztink Ztink
item.description:
@Ztink wrote:

i compile and i get this message.

it showed that message b4. i tried fixing it. but when i did what it said. i ended up causing more issues. so i kinda left it. if that has anything to do with codes not working please tell me how to fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom items are nulls

item.description:
@sodanakin wrote:

try compiling and restart server and client

item.title: Custom items are nulls
item.dc:creator: @Ztink Ztink
item.description:
@Ztink wrote:

i have the models for 2 of the 3 models for the codes i am using. and i put the ints in the class8.java file these are the ones i used:

if (paramInt == 9999) { localClass8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; localClass8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; localClass8.anIntArray156 = new int[5]; localClass8.anIntArray160 = new int[5]; localClass8.anInt174 = 3288; localClass8.anInt181 = 2000; localClass8.anInt190 = 500; localClass8.anInt198 = 0; localClass8.anInt169 = -6; localClass8.anInt194 = 1; localClass8.anInt204 = 14; localClass8.anInt165 = 3287; localClass8.anInt200 = 3287; localClass8.anInt175 = -1; localClass8.anInt197 = -1; localClass8.anInt199 = -1; localClass8.aString170 = "Death Cape"; localClass8.aByteArray178 = "The cape worn by masters of PKing.".getBytes(); }

if(i == 8002) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aString170 = "Dragon claws"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 13699; class8.anInt181 = 630; class8.anInt190 = 268; class8.anInt198 = 1340; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -7; class8.anInt194 = -13; class8.anInt165 = 13698; class8.anInt200 = 13698; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

if (paramInt == 16000) { localClass8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; localClass8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; localClass8.anIntArray156 = new int[9]; localClass8.anIntArray160 = new int[9]; localClass8.anIntArray156[0] = 10266; localClass8.anIntArray160[0] = 925; localClass8.anIntArray156[1] = 10275; localClass8.anIntArray160[1] = 925; localClass8.anIntArray156[2] = 10291; localClass8.anIntArray160[2] = 924; localClass8.anIntArray156[3] = 10283; localClass8.anIntArray160[3] = 924; localClass8.anIntArray156[4] = 4550; localClass8.anIntArray160[4] = 925; localClass8.anIntArray156[5] = 10287; localClass8.anIntArray160[5] = 924; localClass8.anIntArray156[6] = 8375; localClass8.anIntArray160[6] = 80; localClass8.anIntArray156[7] = 8384; localClass8.anIntArray160[7] = 75; localClass8.anIntArray156[8] = 8367; localClass8.anIntArray160[8] = 70; localClass8.anInt174 = 2361; localClass8.anInt181 = 1330; localClass8.anInt190 = 572; localClass8.anInt198 = 302; localClass8.anInt169 = 0; localClass8.anInt194 = 1; localClass8.anInt165 = 2531; localClass8.anInt200 = 2531; localClass8.anInt164 = 2642; localClass8.anInt188 = 2642; localClass8.aBoolean176 = false; localClass8.aString170 = "Dragon platebody"; localClass8.aByteArray178 = "An ancient Platebody".getBytes(); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2009, 10:59:47 pm[/size][hr]do i need to add the items to the class8.class file as well because I’ve only added them to the class8.java file. and idk how to add to the class8.class file. so if that is what u need to do then please tell me how. and when i go to read the class8.class file the codes aren’t in it only in the class8.java files.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom items are nulls
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Umm, by the sounds of it your only adding the items via server-sided. You must make ints, models, and put the ints in class8.java in the client. That will fix the null.

Read full topic
